attributes.action: NHS traetment for elderley - means tested
attributes.additional_details:
This applies to ENGLAND only as it relates to presciptions charges.

Elderley people get automatically free prescriptions once they reach retirement age. This is unfair as the rest of us have to pay. I agree people on low income and low pensions should be entitled but why are millionaires? They can afford them. Some of us pay taxes to support millionaires why? Should be capped on the ammount of savings they have.
